statements: SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM iot_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE device_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE device_status = FALSE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM iot_devices WHERE device_id > 10;
SELECT device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE device_location LIKE '%Kitchen%';
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE device_id BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM iot_devices WHERE device_location = 'Bedroom' AND device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_status FROM iot_devices WHERE device_name = 'Smart Bulb';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM iot_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM iot_devices GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_location, AVG(device_id) AS avg_device_id FROM iot_devices GROUP BY device_location;
SELECT device_id FROM iot_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT device_location FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE device_location IN ('Living Room', 'Kitchen');
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM iot_devices WHERE device_location ='Bedroom' OR device_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM iot_devices OFFSET 5 LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_location) AS unique_locations FROM iot_devices;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM data;
SELECT data_value, data_timestamp FROM data;
SELECT devices.device_name, data.data_value FROM devices JOIN data ON devices.device_id = data.device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, data.data_value FROM devices, data WHERE devices.device_id = data.device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, data.data_value FROM devices INNER JOIN data ON devices.device_id = data.device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, data.data_value FROM devices LEFT JOIN data ON devices.device_id = data.device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, data.data_value FROM devices RIGHT JOIN data ON devices.device_id = data.device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, data.data_value FROM devices FULL JOIN data ON devices.device_id = data.device_id;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_location = 'Room A';
SELECT * FROM data WHERE data_value = 'value1';
SELECT devices.device_name, data.data_value FROM devices JOIN data ON devices.device_id = data.device_id WHERE devices.device_location = 'Room A';
SELECT devices.device_name, data.data_value FROM devices JOIN data ON devices.device_id = data.device_id WHERE data.data_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM devices;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data;
SELECT AVG(data_value) FROM data;
SELECT SUM(data_value) FROM data;
SELECT MAX(data_value) FROM data;
SELECT MIN(data_value) FROM data;
SELECT AVG(data_value) FROM data WHERE data_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT id, name FROM devices;
SELECT name, location FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT id, location FROM devices WHERE status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, name FROM devices ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE AND location = 'Room 1';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM devices;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM devices;
SELECT MIN(id) FROM devices;
SELECT MAX(id) FROM devices;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM devices;
SELECT id, name, location FROM devices WHERE location IN ('Room 1', 'Room 2');
SELECT id, name, location FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM devices GROUP BY name;
SELECT id, name, location, status FROM devices WHERE name = 'Device 1';
SELECT * FROM Devices
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM Devices
SELECT * FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM Sensors
SELECT * FROM Readings
SELECT reading_id, reading_value FROM Readings
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users
SELECT device_name, sensor_name FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id
SELECT device_name, sensor_name, reading_value FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id
SELECT username, email FROM Users
SELECT device_name, sensor_name, username FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id JOIN Users ON Sensors.sensor_id = Users.user_id
SELECT device_name, sensor_type FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id
SELECT device_name, reading_timestamp FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id
SELECT device_type, reading_value FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id

SELECT device_name, username FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id JOIN Users ON Readings.sensor_id = Users.user_id
SELECT device_name, sensor_name, username FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id JOIN Users ON Sensors.sensor_id = Users.user_id
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM Sensors JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id
SELECT device_name, reading_timestamp FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id
SELECT username, email, device_name FROM Users JOIN Sensors ON Users.user_id = Sensors.sensor_id JOIN Devices ON Sensors.device_id = Devices.device_id
